summary: SummaryETUDE Soonjung pH 6.5 Whip Cleanser is a mild, soft-bubble cleanser with a whipped cream texture. Its weakly acidic bubbles gently cleanse the face, reducing friction and providing a mild wash for the skin.
details: DetailsBenefitsWHIP CLEANSER WITH RICH MICRO BUBBLES: Soft and rich lather that minimizes skin friction and gently cleanses the skinSOOTHING BUBBLES FOR SENSITIVE SKIN: Infused with Panthenol and Madecassoside to calm and protect sensitive skinHYPOALLERGENIC & SLIGHTLY ACIDIC PH FORMULA: Specially formulated to address the causes of sensitive skin, such as dryness, a weakened skin barrier, and irritation. As the first step in your skincare routine, it helps promote healthier, more balanced skinFRAGRANCE-FREE: Unscented, ideal for sensitive skinKey IngredientsPanthensosideâ„¢: Panthenol (Protection of skin barrier & retains moisture, and soothes dry skin) + Madecassoside (Soothing effect for irritated skin)Formulated WithoutFree from 10 additives (Free of animal-derived ingredients, mineral oil, synthetic pigment, fragrance, polyacrylamide,silicone oil, imidazolidinyl urea, triethanolamine, PEG surfactant, paraben)Item 2636343How To UsePump 2-3 times and gently massage foam onto damp skin. Rinse off with lukewarm water.As this product is free from synthetic fragrances, exposure to direct sunlight or extreme temperatures may cause a natural scent. The product itself remains safe and effective.IngredientsWater, Glycerin, Sorbitol, Propanediol, Lauryl Glucoside, Disodium Cocoyl Glutamate, Panthenol, Citric Acid, Glyceryl Caprylate, Ethylhexylglycerin, Madecassoside, Butylene Glycol, Tocopherol, Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract.
how_to_use: Pump 2-3 times and gently massage foam onto damp skin. Rinse off with lukewarm water.As this product is free from synthetic fragrances, exposure to direct sunlight or extreme temperatures may cause a natural scent. The product itself remains safe and effective.

reviews.headline: Great for my sensitive/reactive skin
reviews.comments: I have rosacea and fungal acne (malassezia yeast). My skin is very sensitive and reactive to a lot of ingredients. This foaming face wash has been my holy grail for the last ~3 years! Works better than even Vanicream for me. Highly recommend it.

reviews.headline: Cleanses without stripping skin
reviews.comments: I have very sensitive, dry and acne prone skin. Ive used cerave, cetaphil and most recently la roshe posay. Ive had allergic reactions to some or my face never felt clean, like i was washing my face with lotion BUT not with this wash. I get no adverse reaction to it and it leaves my face feeling so clean with stripping it dry, i love it, ive found my new face wash

reviews.headline: WONDERFUL
reviews.comments: I 100% love it. My first face wash that ive actually picked up to use again ( not a big skin care girly) but chat gbt put me on and i couldnt be happier fixjng to buy my second bottle ;)

reviews.headline: Great gentle cleanser
reviews.comments: I've used cerave, cetaphil, and vanicream, and this cleanser is by far my favorite gentle cleanser

reviews.headline: Great AM Cleanser!
reviews.comments: I brought this cleanser at a K-Beauty shop on vacation and have been using it in the mornings. I can say that its a great morning cleanser, and my skin feels clean without feeling tight. I love the soft texture and the slip makes it easy to spread as I wash my face. It's easy to wash off as well which is a plus if I'm rushing in the mornings. I'm glad it's now being sold in Ulta!

reviews.headline: Great Cleanser
reviews.comments: Ive been waiting for this product to arrive!! Its a lightweight cleanser for all skin types definitely would reccomend!
